title: Fiery Stir-Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['1 (2.5cm) piece fresh ginger, cut in half', '1 whole young chicken, cleaned and cut into 2cm cubes', '2 cloves garlic, sliced', '2 tablespoons rice wine', '1 teaspoon sugar', 'salt and ground white pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons cooking oil', '1 teaspoon chopped dried tangerine peel', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon Sichuan peppercorns', '100g dried red chillies']
